tools.name: kubert
tools.description: Rust Kubernetes runtime helpers. Based on kube-rs.

tools.name: kuber-s
tools.description: A Rust client for Kubernetes in the style of a more generic client-go, a runtime abstraction inspired by controller-runtime, and a derive macro for CRDs inspired by kubebuilder.

tools.name: Turmoil
tools.description: Turmoil is a framework for testing distributed systems. It provides deterministic execution by running multiple concurrent hosts within a single thread. It introduces `hardship` into the system via changes in the simulated network and filesystem.

tools.name: Tracing
tools.description: tracing is a framework for instrumenting Rust programs to collect structured, event-based diagnostic information.
